description: This file defines a TransactionService class in Dart that manages financial transactions by communicating with a backend REST API. It includes methods for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting transactions, as well as resolving category identifiers dynamically.

classes.name: TransactionService
classes.description: A service class providing static methods for managing transactions through REST API calls.

methods.name: fetchTransactions
methods.description: Fetches all transactions for the authenticated user from the backend.

methods.name: createTransaction
methods.description: Creates a new transaction in the backend, resolving category names to category IDs and adjusting data fields for backend schema.

methods.name: updateTransaction
methods.description: Updates a specific transaction identified by its ID.

methods.name: deleteTransaction
methods.description: Deletes a specific transaction by ID.
